text: By nature I'm not a brooder.
author: Hugh Jackman

text: I have two children and it's amazing how in tune they are with nature, with light, with smells, with time.
author: Hugh Jackman

text: That's all about the natural order of things, the idea of nature protecting children but also children protecting nature.
author: Hugh Jackman

text: I know I'm not known as method. By nature I'm not a brooder. What I continue to use is a mixture of the English school, which is traditionally outside-in, and the more American way of working from the inside out.
author: Hugh Jackman

text: Chaos was the law of nature Order was the dream of man.
author: Henry Adams
